case_study.subtitle: How a Digital Bank Slashed Response Times and Lightened Call Center Load
case_study.deskripsi:
By integrating HERA's AI Chatbot, a leading national digital bank successfully reduced the load on their call center by 45%, allowing their human agents to focus on more complex cases.

More impressively, customer response time dropped from an average of 4 minutes to under 10 seconds. With 24/7 availability and instant, accurate responses, the AI-powered solution helped boost customer satisfaction, operational efficiency, and overall digital experience—proving just how impactful smart automation can be in modern banking.
